name: Attack of the Rolling ROM Robots
name_original: Attack of the Rolling ROM Robots
description: Another 10Liner game for the Mattel Aquarius! - Your planet is under attack from the Rolling ROM Robots!! Control your anti-ROM attack ship by using 'z' for left, '.' for right and to shoot! Destroy the Rolling ROM Robots by hitting their only vulnerable spot... the massive wheel that propels them! Shoot as many as you can.. but watch out for the fast ones!!
